article_text: New blockbuster drugs can cure or control deadly diseases such as hepatitis C, but treatment can cost tens of thousands of dollars. Patient advocates and health plans want to know why manufacturers charge such high prices. California lawmakers have introduced bills to shed light on pricing and limit patients’ out-of-pocket payments.
